definition: to pass/to spend (time)/measure/limit/extent/degree of intensity/degree (angles, temperature etc)/kilowatt-hour/classifier for events and occurrences

sentences.english: Objective To study the therapeutic effect of biological amnion covering on early severe ocular burn.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討生物羊膜在早期重度眼表燒傷中的臨牀療效。

sentences.english: He adds that this epidemic of severe obesity is too extensive to be tackled with just medications.
sentences.chinese: 他補充說，重度肥胖這種流行病僅靠藥物難以解決。

sentences.english: Results Severe PIH and postpartum hemorrhage were the major factors that led to MOF.
sentences.chinese: 結果導致MOF的主要因素爲重度妊高徵及產後出血。

sentences.english: Conclusion Expectorant can shorten the duration of moderate and severe acute exacerbations of asthma in children.
sentences.chinese: 結論祛痰藥能縮短中重度兒童急性哮喘的病程。

sentences.english: The medication has been commonly prescribed to treat serious acne since the 1980s.
sentences.chinese: 這種藥自1980來以來被廣泛使用治療重度痤瘡。

sentences.english: Objective To analyze the effect of speech therapy on severe hyperkinetic dysarthria.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察言語訓練對於重度痙攣型構音障礙效果分析。

sentences.english: Moderate and heavy hepatic steatosis can be used in the liver transplantation.
sentences.chinese: 中到重度小泡性肝細胞脂肪變是可用的。

sentences.english: The most common are major depressive disorder and dysthymic disorder.
sentences.chinese: 最常見的是重度抑鬱症和心境惡劣障礙。

sentences.english: This is a ball of Ascaris lumbricoides worms removed from the colon of an adult.
sentences.chinese: 成年人結腸取出的蛔蟲團，爲重度感染。

sentences.english: Simple obesity was the risk factor of children's adaptive behavior.
sentences.chinese: 中度和重度肥胖對適應行爲有明顯影響。

sentences.english: Severe hypertension with blood pressure reduction after hospitalization.
sentences.chinese: 重度高血壓住院後血壓下降。

sentences.english: So far until recent, some Dementia Elder Group Home is also available for the high degree of Senile Dementia.
sentences.chinese: 最近的團體家屋已適用於重度的失智症老人。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effect of Jinzhi Hanshuye on severe periodontitis.
sentences.chinese: 觀察金梔含漱液對重度牙周炎的治療效果。

sentences.english: Severe poisoning patients may appear disturbance of consciousness conditions varying from deep coma to cerebral cortex failure.
sentences.chinese: 重度中毒者意識障礙程度達深昏迷或去大腦皮質狀態。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effect of severe obesity on blood viscosity.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討重度肥胖對血液粘度產生的影響。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the clinical value of early oral gastrointestinal nutrition in the patients with severe burn.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討重度燒傷患者早期口服胃腸營養的臨牀價值。

definition: slow and patient/chronic (disease)/slow to take effect (e.g. a slow poison)
to contract (an illness)/to be afflicted with/to suffer from
